sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CSMContentAccessUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Utils for CSM Content Access.</description>
        <name>CSMContentAccessUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSMContentAccessUtils = Class.create();
CSMContentAccessUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	//Returns an EP service to run can*() checks.
	getContentAccessEPService: function(tableName, current){
		if(gs.nil(tableName) || gs.nil(current))
			return null;

		return new global.ContentAccessEPService(tableName, current);
	},

    type: 'CSMContentAccessUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-09-29 16:44:06</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5b00ab8f773e3010d3ef07dc7d5a996f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSMContentAccessUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5b00ab8f773e3010d3ef07dc7d5a996f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>

    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
